round_best: Develop an adaptive meta-learning algorithm for reinforcement learning that specifically targets high-dimensional nonlinear systems. This algorithm would use a small, diverse set of "meta-tasks" derived from commonalities in biological and robotic systems to learn a generalized policy initialization. This initialization could then be quickly adapted to new tasks using fewer computational resources and less manual tuning, thereby improving efficiency and scalability in real-world applications.
